text: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: So We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea. So see how was the end of the wrongdoers
translation.id: Maka Kami siksa dia (Fir'aun) dan bala tentaranya, lalu Kami lemparkan mereka ke dalam laut. Maka perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang yang zalim
